p.k: Smoothie Party Lola leaves the supermarket with all the ingredients for a super smoothie party. But disaster! She realizes she has forgotten the milk. She entrusts the shopping to Pat and heads off to the milk section. But the Guanos have their eyes on her provisions an...
p.d: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat is the hero that flies to his friends' rescue while avoiding numerous obstacles that get in his way.
